Question 40 
 
[Geotechnical Engineering : Compaction of Soil] 
 
With reference to the compaction test conducted on soils, which of the following is INCORRECT? 
 
(A) Peak point of the compaction curve gives the maximum dry unit weight and optimum moisture
content 
 
(B) With increase in the compaction effort, the maximum dry unit weight increases 
 
(C) With increase in the compaction effort, the optimum moisture content decreases 
 
(D) Compaction curve crosses the zero-air-voids curve 
Ans.  (D) 
Sol.

dmH

dmL
High CE
Low CE

d
Zero air void uniform
H
OMC
L
OMC
Hence, the correct option is (D).
